title: New: Erik Jonasson – Like A Funeral
body:
Wow.

What a vocal. This might be the first song this year to leave me almost speechless. Scandinavian **Erik Jonasson’s** debut, _Like A Funeral_, is a stripped back moment of beauty – as poignant as they come. Check it below.

_What have you done to me?_

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
